home.heroTitle: Find Your Perfect Car at Auction
home.heroSubtitle: Browse through hundreds of quality vehicles. Bid on cars, motorcycles, and trucks from trusted sources. New auctions daily.
home.checkBackSoon: Check back soon for new listings!
home.whyChooseDesc: The trusted platform for vehicle auctions
home.verifiedVehiclesDesc: Every vehicle is thoroughly inspected and verified before listing
home.realTimeBiddingDesc: Bid in real-time with instant updates and notifications
home.trustedCommunityDesc: Join thousands of verified buyers and sellers
home.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have found their perfect vehicle through our platform.
home.howItWorksDesc: Start bidding on premium vehicles in three simple steps
home.step1Desc: Explore our curated selection of premium vehicles from trusted sources
home.step2Desc: Set your maximum bid and let our system bid for you automatically
home.step3Desc: Win the auction and arrange pickup or delivery of your new vehicle

about.title: About Samochody.be
about.subtitle: Poland's premier online vehicle auction platform, connecting buyers with quality vehicles from trusted sources across Europe.
about.ourStoryText: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the vehicle auction industry in Poland, Samochody.be has grown to become the country's leading online platform for buying quality vehicles at competitive prices.
about.ourMissionText: To provide a transparent, efficient, and trustworthy marketplace where buyers can find their perfect vehicle with confidence.
about.trustDesc: Complete vehicle history and detailed inspection reports for every listing
about.customerFirstDesc: Dedicated support team available to assist you throughout your journey
about.qualityDesc: Rigorous verification process ensures only quality vehicles are listed
about.competitiveDesc: Auction format ensures you get the best possible price
about.accessDesc: Browse and bid on vehicles anytime, anywhere
about.deliveryDesc: Safe and secure delivery to any location in Poland

rules.title: Auction Rules
rules.subtitle: Please read our auction rules carefully before participating

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
